description:
John Lewis & Partners as a Brand and Christmas are firmly linked together at this time of year.

From the famous Christmas advert and Black Friday to all the great products bought as part of the festive season.

The Digital Technology team at John Lewis will be discussing how they have evolved to support John Lewis & Partners through this critical trading period and areas they are looking at in future to continue to build upon their success

***
Speakers

Christian Mason - John Lewis & Partners, Delivery & Operations Manager

Sandra Christie - John Lewis & Partners, Technical Profession Lead

Alex Moss - John Lewis & Partners, Engineering Lead
title: John Lewis and Christmas
